sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"预言，预示，预告"之意。
means: forecast ： 指对未来事件的预报、推测或设想，侧重最终可能出现的结果。
foretell ： 一般的通俗用语，往往指根据客观因素做出的预告，强调预先要发生的事。
predict ： 较正常的正式用词，通常用于人。指根据事实或自然规律进行推断后作出预告，隐含有科学的准确性。
foresee ： 指提前、预先料到将要发生的事或指对未发生的事情形成一种概念或判断。

sentence.Network_en: We do not foresee any problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们预料不会出任何问题。

sentence.Network_en: No one can foresee what will happen in the future.
sentence.Network_cn: 谁也无法预见到将来会发生什么事.

sentence.Network_en: He did not foresee any problems.
sentence.Network_cn: 他没有预见到任何问题。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... foretell 预言 foresee 预见 foreword 序言，前言.
预字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 预支,预付〖 payinadvance〗 预知〖 foresee〗 预制〖 prefabricate〗.
英语语言词典 [foresee] # 翻译 [foresee] ... 1 预知,预料… ~ trouble 未卜先知 foresee.
小学英语不规则过去式_百度知道 ... forerun 作先驱 foresee 看穿 foreshow 预示.

list.abs: in the reality I foresee , however , people will become familiar with far greater aspects of themselves , and bring these into actualization .然而在现实中，我预见人们将会变得对他们自己的远更伟大的方面更为熟悉，并会将它们带入现实。
护理见闻,the... ... ) foreseeing nursing 预见性护理 ) foreseeable nursing 预见性护理 ) Nursing foresight 护理预见性.
英文里的“营养性死亡”_网易教育 ... irregular pattern= 不规则图案 foreseeable future= 可预见的未来 medium well= （牛排）7分熟.
reasonable中文 ... 合理的考虑 reasonable contemplation 合理的预见 reasonable foreseeability ... rear-vision mirror 后视镜.
英美侵权法之中，有一源远流长的“合理预见”(reasonable foreseeability )规则，大意是侵权人除非故意，只对其能够合理预见的损害承 …

entry.def: If you foresee something, you expect and believe that it will happen.

example.ex: He did not foresee any problems...
example.tran: 他没有预见到任何问题。

example.ex: ...a dangerous situation which could have been foreseen...
example.tran: 原本可以预见到的危险情况

means.word_mean: 3. act in advance of; deal with ahead of time

auth_sentence.content: I foresee a big anti-climactic 'buyer's remorse'.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I foresee a big anti-climactic 'buyer's remorse'.

auth_sentence.content: Did the plant builders foresee that close call?
auth_sentence.res_content: Did the plant builders foresee that close call?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Did the plant builders foresee that close call?

auth_sentence.content: He could not foresee what would happen there.
auth_sentence.res_content: He could not foresee what would happen there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He could not foresee what would happen there.

stems_affixes.word_buile: fore前面,预先→adv.在前面 adj.先前的
fore前面,预先+going情况[说和做]→前面所说所做
fore前面,预先→adv.在前面 adj.先前的
fore前面,预先+ever永远→adv.永远,总是,老是
fore前面,预先+arm胳膊→n.前臂 v.准备战斗, 预先武装
fore前面,预先+head头→n.前额;[任何事物的]前部
fore前面,预先+shadow影子→影子预先来
fore预先+stall放→预先放上东西→制止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准备战斗, 预先武装
stems_affixes.word_buile: fore前面,预先+arm胳膊→n.前臂 v.准备战斗, 预先武装
fore前面,预先+cast扔→预先扔下→预料
fore前面,预先+see看见→提前看见

sentences.cn: 他预见了世界大战的爆发。

sentences.en: He foresaw that it would rain before morning.
sentences.cn: 他预知清晨之前就会下雨。

sentences.en: No one can foresee what will happen in the future.
sentences.cn: 谁也无法预见到将来会发生什么事。

jushi.english: The magician foresaw the man's death.
jushi.chinese: 魔法师预言了那个人的死期。

jushi.english: We should have foreseen this trouble months ago and made provisions for it.
jushi.chinese: 几个月以前我们就该预知这场麻烦,并为此做好准备。

jushi.english: It was not easy to foresee the consequences.
